verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] set to announce his decision on whether or not he will pull the U.S. out of the Iran nuclear deal .
[ARG1: President Donald Trump] is [V: set] [ARG2: to announce his decision on whether or not he will pull the U.S. out of the Iran nuclear deal] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is set to [V: announce] [ARG1: his decision on whether or not he will pull the U.S. out of the Iran nuclear deal] .
President Donald Trump is set to announce his decision on whether or not he [V: will] pull the U.S. out of the Iran nuclear deal .
President Donald Trump is set to announce his decision on whether or not [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: pull] [ARG1: the U.S.] [ARG2: out of the Iran nuclear deal] .
